actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for the counting of certain military engagements for which ribbons were awarded toward the years of service requirements for eligibility for certain benefits under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to include service in the military during specified periods toward the "years of service" requirement for eligibility for retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for the counting of certain military engagements for which ribbons were awarded toward the years of service requirements for eligibility for certain benefits under such Act.
